name: GHVB
description:
Get ready to RAGE as you travel into Mar's deep narrow underground tunnels!

◐ Controls ◑
  • G, H, V, B to activate / deactivate boosters
  • Don't crash into the walls of the tunnel
  • Reach the checkpoints
◐ Credits ◑
  • Coding &Art by MilkBomb11
  • Music is Smart Riot by Huma-Huma

Estimated finish time : 20 ~ 40 minutes
